name: com.irsiksoftware.logsmith.sinks
description: Optional sink implementations for LogSmith including HTTP/REST, Sentry, Seq, and Elasticsearch integrations. Enables logging to external services without modifying the core package.

samples.description: Example scene demonstrating HTTP Sink usage for sending logs to REST endpoints
Example scene demonstrating Sentry integration for error tracking and monitoring
Example scene demonstrating Seq integration for structured logging and analysis
Example scene demonstrating Elasticsearch integration for large-scale log storage
